last_episode_to_air.name: Sheep Farmer
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Timmy sees a particularly grumpy farmer giving one of the flock a hard time, he decides to give him an idea of what it's like to be a sheep.

name: Shaun the Sheep
overview: Shaun the Sheep thinks and acts like a person in a barnyard, which usually gets him into trouble. The farmer's sheepdog, Bitzer, tries to keep Shaun and his friends out of trouble. The farmer is oblivious to the humanlike features of his flock, who are like one big, happy family.

episodes.name: Off the Baa!
episodes.overview: When a cabbage bounces into the field from a passing truck, Shaun and his pals decide to use it as a football, with little help from the pigs.

episodes.name: Bathtime
episodes.overview: Who likes a freezing bath? Noone! Shaun and pals go commando and do everything they can to have a hot relaxing sheep dip!

episodes.name: Shape Up with Shaun
episodes.overview: Shirley grows heavier, and Shaun and the flock do their best to help her lose weight. It works, but an accident in which Timmy and a tractor were involved launches Shirley into a pie truckâ€”and back to her fat, weighty state.

episodes.name: Timmy in a Tizzy
episodes.overview: Timmy the little lamb is distraught when the farmer take's his favourite toy, can Shaun and pals get it back?

episodes.name: Scrumping
episodes.overview: Those pesky pigs have taken all the apples, and wont let the sheep have one - they didn't count on Shaun!

episodes.name: Still Life
episodes.overview: The Farmer oil paints the farm, but runs out of white paint for the sheep. Shaun tries to fix the painting, but soon the rest of the flock are a riot of colour. Although the painting appears ruined, it actually proves to be a fortune-winning masterpiece at the end.

episodes.name: Mower Mouth
episodes.overview: Goats will eat anything, including the sheep's grass - whilst they look on in horror!

episodes.name: Take Away
episodes.overview: Sheep can't order pizzas, can they? Noone told Shaun and pals, as they strip the scarecrow and head off into town.

episodes.name: The Bull
episodes.overview: Shaun turns matador when a new addition joins the flock.

episodes.name: Saturday Night Shaun
episodes.overview: It's partytime when Shaun finds the farmer's old records, who knew sheep could boogie down?

episodes.name: The Kite
episodes.overview: What's more fun than a kite on a windy afternoon? Nothing when Shaun and pals are concerned.

episodes.name: Little Sheep of Horrors
episodes.overview: Little lambs shouldn't watch scary movies, as Timmy finds out to his cost.

episodes.name: Sheep on the Loose
episodes.overview: When the flock go on a day trip, Shaun must convince the farmer that nothing is amiss.

episodes.name: Fleeced
episodes.overview: It's time for a haircut for Shaun and his pals, but is the Farmer really the right man for the job? Not after his first attempt!

episodes.name: Shaun Shoots the Sheep
episodes.overview: Shaun finds a camera and sets about taking everyone's photos, whether they want it or not. Are there some prima donnas among the flock?

episodes.name: Big Top Timmy
episodes.overview: Little Lamb Timmy joins the circus tonight, but will he make it in show business?

episodes.name: Fetching
episodes.overview: With Bitzer head over tails in love with a local lass, can Shaun keep the flock in order?

episodes.name: Mountains Out of Molehills
episodes.overview: With the flock in a dancing mood, not even a molehill can spoil their fun... or can it?

episodes.name: Buzz off Bees
episodes.overview: Something's different around the field, Shaun and the flock decide to investigate.

episodes.name: Things That go Bump
episodes.overview: Strange noises are scaring the flock, Shaun goes to investigate...

episodes.name: Abracadabra
episodes.overview: When Shaun dresses as the farmer he suddenly has the power to boss Bitzer around, so he decides to throw a party. All goes to plan until Shaun encounters the real farmer...

episodes.name: Who's the Mummy?
episodes.overview: Shaun finds himself out of his depth when newly hatched chicks believe he's their mummy, aw.

episodes.name: WashDay
episodes.overview: The sheep use the farmer's clotheshorse as a merry-go-round - the garments get dirty and have to be washed before the farmer returns.

episodes.name: The Visitor
episodes.overview: When a strange space craft crash-lands on the farm, Shaun and co. help its little green occupant get air-borne again.

episodes.name: Shaun the Farmer
episodes.overview: It is a peaceful night at the farm, until Shaun starts to walk in his sleep. The Flock cannot resist their natural instinct to follow, and chaos soon ensues.

episodes.name: Tooth Fairy
episodes.overview: The farmer comes across his old golf clubs and decides to knock a few balls around, instantly putting his back out in the process. Shaun takes the opportunity to learn how to play, while Bitzer is forced to tend to his injured master inside the house.

episodes.name: Bitzer Puts His Foot In It
episodes.overview: The farmer gets ready for a date and wants to look his best, so it's time to dust off his prized hairpiece. Shaun can't resist trying the wig on but loses it while showing off to the flock. The race is on as Shaun and Bitzer try to return the wig in time for the farmer's big night.

episodes.name: Hiccups
episodes.overview: Shirley drinks Bitzer's lemonade too fast and gets the hiccups. Shaun tries to help with all the usual tricks, and the usual results.

episodes.name: If You Can't Stand The Heat
episodes.overview: Timmy accidentally eats a tomato grown with Miracle-Grow fertilizer, and expands to become the King Kong of sheep. Shaun must keep the giant toddler out of sight while trying to figure out how to return him to normal size. In the end a Duck eats the growth spurt and grows even bigger than a house.

episodes.name: Sheepwalking
episodes.overview: The sheep's field is in a mess, and the Farmer tells Bitzer to clean it up - but he makes the mistake of getting Shaun and company to help.

episodes.name: Tidy Up
episodes.overview: The tractor seems to be ready for the scrap heap and the farmer wishes he could afford to buy a new one. So the sheep overhaul it...

episodes.name: The Farmer's Niece
episodes.overview: When the Farmer's Niece comes to stay, Shaun and Bitzer soon discover she isn't as cute and adorable as she seems.

episodes.name: Camping Chaos
episodes.overview: An unfriendly camper sets up his tent in the sheep's field. When he goes off exploring, Shaun and the Flock decide to do some exploring of their own.

episodes.name: Helping Hound
episodes.overview: The Farmer is terrorised when a cute mouse appears in the farmhouse and Pidsley the cat is ordered to dispose of the rodent. When the mouse takes refuge in Shaun's fleece, the flock persuade him to protect their new friend from the pitiless cat.

episodes.name: Troublesome Tractor
episodes.overview: The Farmer trying to impress his new date by cooking a romantic dinner. Unfortunately, the Farmer can't cook and Bitzer is a useless maitre d'. Can Shaun and the flock save the day when they take over the catering behind the scenes?

episodes.name: Stick with Me
episodes.overview: Everything must go when the farmer sets up a stall by the side of the road and leaves Bitzer in charge. The lazy sheepdog soon tires of his role and gives Shaun the job. He proves to be a much better salesman than Bitzer and the flock are only too happy to get stuck in, selling pretty much all the farmer's worldly possessions.

episodes.name: Heavy Metal Shaun
episodes.overview: The farmer throws a fancy-dress house party for his birthday. When Bitzer loses all the invitations, however, Shaun saves the day again. Disguised in their own ingenious costumes, the sheep stand in as the guests and have a good old knees-up. But can they fool the farmer into believing he is surrounded by his friends?

episodes.name: Snore-Worn Shaun
episodes.overview: Shirley's snoring is keeping the flock awake, so Shaun decides that the only way to get a peaceful night's sleep is to get her out of the barn.

episodes.name: Save the Tree
episodes.overview: It is a scorching hot day, and the Flock is desperate to cool down in the Sheep Dip. There's only one thing in their way: the sun-bathing Farmer!

episodes.name: Shaun Encounters
episodes.overview: Two alien kids land at the farm one night and run riot. Shaun and Bitzer attempt to stop the aliens before The Farmer finds out.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: When Shaun dresses as the farmer he suddenly has the power to boss Bitzer around, so he decides to throw a party. All goes to plan until Shaun encounters the real farmer...

episodes.name: Draw the Line
episodes.overview: The flock hijack a road line-painting machine and cause chaos while creating giant works of art in the field. However, will farmer appreciate their art?

episodes.name: Sheepless Nights
episodes.overview: When the sheep's stable's roof is broken, rain leaks in. The sheep try to gain dry land, but the only space they can find is the pig's sty, whom the pigs fart during the big sleep.

episodes.name: Spring Lamb
episodes.overview: A reluctant Timmy tries to avoid bath time and in trying to escape he gets a spring attached to his tail. It's up to the flock to catch the bouncing baby sheep and return him to the tub before he destroys the farm.

episodes.name: Strictly No Dancing
episodes.overview: The farmer hits the dance floor and attempts to learn how to ballroom dance using Pidsley as his dancing partner. The din they create annoys the sheep so much that Shaun decides to stop them.

episodes.name: Who's The Caddy
episodes.overview: The farmer comes across his old golf clubs and decides to knock a few balls around, instantly putting his back out in the process. Shaun takes the opportunity to learn how to play, while Bitzer is forced to tend to his injured master inside the house.

episodes.name: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
episodes.overview: The farmer gets ready for a date and wants to look his best, so it's time to dust off his prized hairpiece. Shaun can't resist trying the wig on but loses it while showing off to the flock. The race is on as Shaun and Bitzer try to return the wig in time for the farmer's big night.

episodes.name: Bagpipe Buddy
episodes.overview: The sheep discover a set of bagpipes on the rubbish dump which they immediately misidentify as a sick emu. They set about trying to nurse it back to health before releasing it back into the wild.

episodes.name: Supersize Timmy
episodes.overview: Timmy accidentally eats a tomato grown with Miracle-Grow fertilizer, and expands to become the King Kong of sheep. Shaun must keep the giant toddler out of sight while trying to figure out how to return him to normal size. In the end a Duck eats the growth spurt and grows even bigger than a house.

episodes.name: Lock Out
episodes.overview: While preparing for bed, the farmer manages to lock himself out of the house and is stuck outside in his pyjamas. He decides to spend the night in the barn but his incessant snoring drives the flock mad. Shaun concocts a plan to return him to his bed without waking him up.

episodes.name: Cheetah Cheater
episodes.overview: A wildlife film inspires Pidsley the cat to play a prank on the flock by disguising himself as a leopard. Shaun is convinced there is a huge beast on the loose and concocts a plan to catch it.

episodes.name: Ewe've Been Framed
episodes.overview: Shaun accidentally breaks the farmer's glasses; he and Bitzer have their work cut out trying to prevent their shortsighted master from having mishaps around the farm.

episodes.name: Bitzer's New Hat
episodes.overview: The Farmer gives Bitzer a horrible new hat. Bitzer is very upset as he treasured his old hat. The flock rallies round to try to cheer him up with a selection of dashing alternative head gear.

episodes.name: Hide And Squeak
episodes.overview: The Farmer is terrorised when a cute mouse appears in the farmhouse and Pidsley the cat is ordered to dispose of the rodent. When the mouse takes refuge in Shaun's fleece, the flock persuade him to protect their new friend from the pitiless cat.

episodes.name: Frantic Romantic
episodes.overview: The Farmer trying to impress his new date by cooking a romantic dinner. Unfortunately, the Farmer can't cook and Bitzer is a useless maitre d'. Can Shaun and the flock save the day when they take over the catering behind the scenes?

episodes.name: Everything Must Go
episodes.overview: Everything must go when the farmer sets up a stall by the side of the road and leaves Bitzer in charge. The lazy sheepdog soon tires of his role and gives Shaun the job. He proves to be a much better salesman than Bitzer and the flock are only too happy to get stuck in, selling pretty much all the farmer's worldly possessions.

episodes.name: Party Animals
episodes.overview: The farmer throws a fancy-dress house party for his birthday. When Bitzer loses all the invitations, however, Shaun saves the day again. Disguised in their own ingenious costumes, the sheep stand in as the guests and have a good old knees-up. But can they fool the farmer into believing he is surrounded by his friends?

episodes.name: Cat Got Your Brain
episodes.overview: Two evil bungling alien scientists transport Pidsley the cat and Shaun aboard their flying saucer. Unfortunately, a foolish error causes the aliens to swap the animals' brains around. Shaun and Pidsley are dumped back to Earth, not realizing they are in the wrong bodies - leading to much confusion around the farm before the aliens return to correct their mistake.At the end, everyone's brains were also swapped.

episodes.name: Two's Company
episodes.overview: Shaun is smitten when a bedraggled new sheep lands among the flock. After a wash in the sheep dip, the newcomer turns out to be quite attractive and Shaun immediately falls head over hoof for her. While Bitzer goes on a journey to find her rightful owner, the flock are kept amused by Shaun's romantic antics.

episodes.name: In The Doghouse
episodes.overview: Bitzer's kennel is accidentally destroyed by the farmer's tractor crashing into it and the canny canine hopes the farmer will replace it with a new deluxe model. But when he sees his master's clumsy attempt to build a new kennel, Bitzer is so horrified that he packs his bags and leaves home. Shaun, however, hopes to tempt Bitzer to return with the kennel of his dreams. At the first scene, the flock are having a party at the chicken coop.

episodes.name: The Boat
episodes.overview: The farmer gets Bitzer to help him renovate an old boat, but as soon as his back is turned the sheep and pigs turn the refurbishment into a swashbuckling game of pirates.

episodes.name: What's Up, Dog?
episodes.overview: A wayward balloonist lands in the sheeps field. Shaun and his friends are intrigued by the hot air balloon and inadvertently take to the skies. Down on the ground an ever more desperate Bitzer runs himself ragged attempting to bring the wayward sheep back down to Earth safely.

episodes.name: Cock-A-Doodle Shaun
episodes.overview: The cockerel is missing and there's no one to wake up the farm. When Shaun discovers the cockerel has been snatched by the greedy fox, he sets off with Bitzer on a daring rescue mission. Will they get the cockerel back in time to wake up the rest of the farm?

episodes.name: Bitzer's Basic Training
episodes.overview: Bitzer thinks The Farmer is planning to replace him, so Shaun helps to knock his friend into shape. Unfortunately Bitzer goes completely over the top with his training regime and starts running the farm with military precision driving everyone crazy.

episodes.name: Chip Off The Old Block
episodes.overview: The Farmer has taken up sculpting, but unintentionally drops a huge slab of stone on top of Timmy's teddy. Shaun and the flock must struggle and strain to lift the heavy block and retrieve the precious toy.

episodes.name: Pig Trouble
episodes.overview: When Bitzer injures his foot and can't work, the Farmer chooses the pigs to take over his role. The power crazy pigs take the opportunity to turn the farm into a porky paradise - at the sheep's expense. Bitzer tries in vain to warn his master what is going on behind his back, but it's Shaun who steps in and restores the status quo ante.

episodes.name: Bitzer From The Black Lagoon
episodes.overview: While trying to retrieve his ball, Bitzer falls into a muddy pond. When Shaun sees a big, blobby, shambling 'thing' squelching across the field, he's convinced they are being attacked by a swamp monster.

episodes.name: Zebra Ducks Of The Serengeti
episodes.overview: After getting covered in soot, two hapless ducks are mistaken for a pair of rare African Zebra Ducks. Seeing a way to make money, the farmer transforms Shaun's field into an exotic duck enclosure, which he gleefully opens to the public. Shaun doesn't appreciate losing his field and sets about exposing the fraud.

episodes.name: Whistleblower
episodes.overview: Bitzer loses his precious whistle and tests out a trumpet as a replacement. Before long, the power of the trumpet goes to his head and his fanfares and jazz styled bugling drives the flock around the bend.

episodes.name: The Big Chase
episodes.overview: When Timmy drives off on the farmer's brand new quad bike, Shaun, Bitzer and the flock have to give chase by any means available. Very soon half the animals on the farm have joined in the chase. Can the sheep rescue Timmy and return the quad bike before the farmer finds out?

episodes.name: The Magpie
episodes.overview: A magpie has nested in the big tree and is causing chaos by stealing everything around the farm. The magpie's nest soon begins to fill up with loot and Shaun has to come up with a brilliant plan to outwit the burgling bird.

episodes.name: Operation Pidsley
episodes.overview: While the farmer is away on a night out, the sheep sneak into the farmhouse for a party.

episodes.name: Pig Swill Fly
episodes.overview: The farm is looking spotless and everyone is on their best behaviour when the dreaded farm Inspector pays a visit.

episodes.name: Shirley Whirley
episodes.overview: In a bid to help move Shirley around the farm Shaun has the idea of fitting up Shirley with wheels.

episodes.name: Foxy Laddie
episodes.overview: A fox arrives at the farm, disguising himself as a handsome ram to infiltrate the flock.

episodes.name: Shaun Goes Potty
episodes.overview: The sheep have fun with the Farmer's new pool table.

episodes.name: An Ill Wind
episodes.overview: The Farmer receives a huge electricity bill and decides to build his own wind turbine to power the farmhouse.

episodes.name: Fireside Favourite
episodes.overview: Bitzer has caught a cold and the Farmer decides to tuck him up in the house to recover.

episodes.name: Snowed In
episodes.overview: Shaun and his chums awake to find the farm covered in snow!

episodes.name: We Wish Ewe A Merry Christmas
episodes.overview: The sheep learn the farmer will be spending Christmas day alone, so the animals decorate the farmhouse to give him a magical time.

episodes.name: The Stand Off
episodes.overview: It's breakfast time and The Farmer discovers he has no fresh milk for his morning cup of tea. He sets off in great haste, only to become ensnared in a 'rush hour' traffic jam. Shaun and The Flock are too impatient to wait for breakfast and take matters into their own hands.

episodes.name: The Coconut
episodes.overview: The farmer wins a coconut from a carnival. Shaun and Bitzer get their hands on it and attempt to crack it open.

episodes.name: The Shepherd
episodes.overview: The farmer enters a shepherd contest to try and earn a trophy.

episodes.name: You Missed A Bit
episodes.overview: Window-cleaning proves to be a lot harder than it's thought to be for Shaun and Bitzer.

episodes.name: Let's Spray
episodes.overview: Graffitti is appearing around the farm, and The Farmer has given Bitzer the job of removing the painted artwork.

episodes.name: The Crow
episodes.overview: A crow in the barn prevents Shaun and the flock from sleeping.

episodes.name: Shaun The Fugitive
episodes.overview: After Shaun is caught eating cakes, an engineer arrives. Shaun thinks he's after him, so he goes into hiding.

episodes.name: Hard To Swallow
episodes.overview: Shaun quits baaing but goes quacking today.

episodes.name: Mission Inboxible
episodes.overview: Shaun goes on a secret mission today to retrieve his football from farmer's home.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Barn
episodes.overview: The farmer hires two builders to change the barn into his own dream house.

episodes.name: The Rounders Match
episodes.overview: Tensions are high during a game of rounders.

episodes.name: Film Night
episodes.overview: Bitzer discovers Shaun watching old home movies in the barn.

episodes.name: Fossils
episodes.overview: Shaun and the Flock help Bitzer discover hidden treasure.

episodes.name: The Skateboard
episodes.overview: Shaun decides he wants to have a go at skateboarding and sets about building a skatepark.

episodes.name: The Piano
episodes.overview: The Farmer plays the piano and tortures everyone with his musical inability.

episodes.name: The Snapshot
episodes.overview: Shaun is accidentally cut out of the Farmer's family photo.

episodes.name: Prickly Heat
episodes.overview: It's a scorching hot day on the farm and the Flock need to cool off. When Bitzer discovers the Sheep Dip is out of action the Flock have to come up with another plan. Meanwhile, the Farmer has his own ideas for cooling off, which don't impress Bitzer at all.

episodes.name: The Hang Glider
episodes.overview: The Farmer has a thrilling new hobby - however it's not as easy as it looks! When the Farmer gets stuck in a tree Bitzer comes to his rescue, leaving Shaun and the Flock to get to grips with the airborne contraption.

episodes.name: The Shadow Play
episodes.overview: It's bedtime for Timmy but he's overtired and his Mum can't get him to sleep. Nothing seems to calm him until Shaun accidentally makes a shadow puppet on the wall. Eureka! They put on a puppet show to help Timmy get to sleep. As the drama unfolds the audience see more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Bull vs Wool
episodes.overview: It's a beautiful day and Shaun, Bitzer and Timmy are enjoying a picnic, when an unexpected guest arrives and spoils the peace. Forced into hiding the trio find ways to entertain themselves, until they have to brave up and face their fear.

episodes.name: Cones
episodes.overview: The flock divert an ice cream van into their field.

episodes.name: Caught Short Alien
episodes.overview: Shaun's old friend the Alien drops by for a loo break.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday Timmy!
episodes.overview: It is Timmy's birthday and the flock thrown him a party.

episodes.name: The Genie
episodes.overview: Shaun dreams of a life in the fast-lane.

episodes.name: 3DTV
episodes.overview: The Farmer is very excited by his new purchase â€“ a 3D TV.

episodes.name: The Smelly Farmer
episodes.overview: Shaun, Bitzer and the flock decide to give the Farmer a wash.

episodes.name: DIY
episodes.overview: Bitzer is left in charge of decorating and calls on the flock for help.

episodes.name: The Rabbit
episodes.overview: The Farmer's niece has come to visit, bringing her a precious pet rabbit.

episodes.name: Prize Possession
episodes.overview: The Farmer can't believe his luck â€“ he has a winning ticket.

episodes.name: The Spider
episodes.overview: Bitzer's antics are rudely disturbed by a persistent insect.

episodes.name: The Looney Tic
episodes.overview: Shaun tries to find out what is causing Bitzer and the flock's strange behaviour.

episodes.name: Men at Work
episodes.overview: When the Farmer discovers he's sprung a leak, he calls the water board to come and fix the problem. The bored flock are thrilled by the opportunity to have some watery fun. When the workmen clock off, the party begins.

episodes.name: The Dog Show
episodes.overview: It's time for the Annual Dog Show and the Farmer is sure Bitzer has a good chance of winning this year. When things don't quite go as planned, the Farmer comes up with an ingenious idea which might help him win...

episodes.name: Missing Piece
episodes.overview: Shaun comes across a discarded jigsaw puzzle.

episodes.name: Wildlife Watch
episodes.overview: A film crew arrives to record a rare bird nesting at Mossybottom Farm.

episodes.name: The Pelican
episodes.overview: An unusual guest lands on the farm.

episodes.name: Bad Boy
episodes.overview: There's a new kid on the block and he's up to no good.

episodes.name: Remote Control
episodes.overview: Bitzer is sent to fix the faulty TV aerial and asks the flock for help.

episodes.name: Phoney Farmer
episodes.overview: The Farmer is off on holiday, but his replacement is only interested in himself.

episodes.name: Ground Dog Day
episodes.overview: Bitzer struggles to finish his list of chores before the ice cream van arrives.

episodes.name: The Intruder
episodes.overview: The Farmer becomes annoyed when a crow begins to create mayhem across the farm. Bitzer disguises himself as a scarecrow, but needs help from Shaun to make the problem disappear.

episodes.name: Bitzer For a Day
episodes.overview: Bitzer is called upon by the Farmer to help him get fit. That isn't quite what he had in mind and it is up to the wily Shaun to teach him to see the error of his ways.

episodes.name: Bitzer's Secret
episodes.overview: The sly fox tries to take advantage of the animals on the farm being distracted whilst cheering on Shaun who was playing Bitzer in the greatest ping pong match ever.

episodes.name: Ping-Pong Poacher
episodes.overview: Calm in the barn is disturbed when a pair of ducks set up a nest on the roof of Bitzer's kennel. The ducks don't take kindly to efforts to encourage them to move on.

episodes.name: Hidden Talents
episodes.overview: Mowermouth the goat gets to annoy everyone when he places first Shaun, then the Flock under his hypnotic spell. Bitzer and Shaun need teamwork to put the goat in his place.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect
episodes.overview: After completing all his tasks, Bitzer is shocked to find the state of the barn and decides to help by tidying up. He has lots of difficulty trying to rehang a wonky picture, till the flock come up with their own solution.

episodes.name: Save the Dump
episodes.overview: When the prospect of the Farmer's new golf course ruining their dump begins to become a reality, Shaun and the Flock have to resort to canny ways to save their prized resources.

episodes.name: Duck!
episodes.overview: Shaun discovers that being in charge while Bitzer is busy with the Farmer, is not just a case of being the bossy dog.

episodes.name: The Stare
episodes.overview: Shaun and the Flock decide to entertain one another with their best party tricks. Their fun is spoilt when the farmer decides that he wants to join in too.

episodes.name: Fruit and Nuts
episodes.overview: Shaun and Nuts have had enough of being grazers and decide to raid the Farmer's apple crop.

episodes.name: Out of Order
episodes.overview: When the farmer gets stuck in the Loo, Bitzer has to get vital supplies to him as a matter of urgency. His initial efforts end in failure and he drafts in Shaun and the gang to help out.

episodes.name: Karma Farmer
episodes.overview: The Farmer is stressed out and has had enough of the farm and it's inhabitants. He storms off for a break, suitcase in hand, only to reappear almost immediately, the same, but somehow different.

episodes.name: Spoilsport
episodes.overview: Shaun persuades Bitzer to take part in his game of Cricket but Bitzer is more worried about the condition of the pitch than the game.

episodes.name: Baa-d Hair Day
episodes.overview: The flock don't recognise Shaun when he loses one his most distinctive features. His old pal Bitzer helps him track down the lost thatch, but not before Shaun becomes very attached to one of the chickens.

episodes.name: The Farmer's Nephew
episodes.overview: Bitzer is left with a mountain of work when the farmer is rendered incapable. Enter the farmhand who is more interested in his mobile phone than getting the task done.

episodes.name: Babysitter Bitzer
episodes.overview: The flock are off for a girls' night, leaving Bitzer to babysit Timmy. It's not long before the youngster makes clear who's in charge.

episodes.name: Dodgy Lodger
episodes.overview: When one of the pigs attempts to make friends with Timmy, his cohort evict him as punishment for un-pig-like behaviour. The sheep take him into the barn and attempt to transform him into the epitome of porcine sophistication.

episodes.name: Dangerous Deliveries
episodes.overview: Every time the postman pays the Farmer a visit, Bitzer's canine instincts get the better of him, resulting in shredded mail and and an irate farmer. Shaun decides to help out by taking on the role of Bitzer's therapist...

episodes.name: Timmy and the Dragon
episodes.overview: Bitzer, Shaun and the flock are convinced that a monster is at loose on the farm and hide in the barn. But what exactly is it they are afraid of?

episodes.name: Bitzer's New Whistle
episodes.overview: Bitzer thinks the future has arrived when he takes delivery of his new high tech farmyard control module but when the gadget malfunctions, Bitzer is left wishing for his old whistle.

episodes.name: Turf Wars
episodes.overview: Battle ensues when the pigs muscle in on Shaun's private club and steal all the pizza. Shaun, Bitzer and the flock mount a rescue mission for Timmy who the pigs have taken hostage

episodes.name: A Prickly Problem
episodes.overview: Timmy decides to helps the hedghogs find a resting place for the night. His efforts, however, lead his weary friends into a series a scrapes rather than giving them a good night's sleep.

episodes.name: Wanted
episodes.overview: The farm is paid an unexpected visit from an escapee from the nearby prison who takes refuge in the barn. After a short while with Shaun and the gang, though, prison doesn't seem such a bad option.

episodes.name: Rude Dude
episodes.overview: Never meet your heroes. The Farmers rock n' roll idol is stranded at the farm when his limousine breaks down. Soon revealed as a spoilt pretender, Shaun decides to show him a lesson from the 'School of Rock'.

episodes.name: Keeping the Peace
episodes.overview: After spending the night putting together the bed instead of sleeping in it, the farmer has a lie in and Bitzer is in charge of making sure his master's rest is uninterrupted.

episodes.name: Happy Farmers' Day
episodes.overview: Bitzer treats the farmer to a restaurant style dining experience, offering a delicious pie as the main course.

episodes.name: Checklist
episodes.overview: Bitzer over-officious management style becomes too much for the sheep who decide it's time for him to chill out. Bitzer's tasks for the day take on a new purpose, for everyone to have some fun!

episodes.name: Return To Sender
episodes.overview: The farmer receives a mystery gift from his antipodean cousin. Unimpressed with the present, he attempts to throw it away only for it to keep reappearing. He becomes convinced it has magical powers.

episodes.name: Cone of Shame
episodes.overview: Bitzer is an all too willing invalid when he has to wear the cone of shame and is happy to let the flock wait on him. That is, until Shaun rumbles his malingering and plots the pooch's comeuppance

episodes.name: Sheep Farmer
episodes.overview: When Timmy sees a particularly grumpy farmer giving one of the flock a hard time, he decides to give him an idea of what it's like to be a sheep.
